name: prop_dmg
description: Damage proportional to max HP (e.g. Wild Rage)

name: reduce_hp
description: Reduce HP to target value (if above)

name: prop_brk_dmg
description: Reduce break gauge proportional to max BRK

name: inflict_weak
description: Inflict weak status. Never used in-game. Balance down and increase all elemental efficacies by 50%.

name: accelerate_effect
description: Accelerate target(s), giving them the next turn(s)

name: brandish_1
description: Brandish (Laura/Aurelia), no downtime after it runs out

name: brandish_2
description: Brandish (Kurt), one turn downtime after it runs out

name: hide_effect
description: Hide effect. Cannot be targetted. Used by some monsters.

name: hp_up
description: HP up by a flat amount

name: ep_up
description: EP up by a flat amount

name: cp_up
description: CP up by a flat amount

name: revive_prop
description: revive with proportion of max HP

name: hp_heal
description: HP up. Used by Tear etc.

name: absorb_hp_phys
description: Deal physical damage and heal by a proportional amount.

name: absorb_hp_mag
description: Deal magical damage and heal by a proportional amount

name: regen_hp
description: Regenerate HP over time, in proportion to max HP.

name: hp_ep_up
description: HP and EP up by a flat amount

name: hp_cp_up
description: HP and CP up by a flat amount

name: ep_cp_up
description: EP and CP up by a flat amount

name: hp_ep_cp_up
description: HP/EP/CP up by a flat amount

name: hp_up_and_cure
description: HP up and cure ailments/stat down

name: emergency_puppet_effect
description: On KO revive with full CP, item breaks

name: increase_drop_chance
description: Increased drop chance for KO'd monsters

name: remedy_fantasia_effect
description: HP up over time? Used by Remedy Fantasia.

name: spell_card_effect
description: Spell Card effect (but only absolute deathblow when used in other places?)

name: devil_doll_effect
description: Revive on KO once per battle

name: revolution_effect
description: if monster level ≥ attacker level, randomly increase damage

name: waterfall_effect
description: if monster level ≤ attacker level, randomly increase damage

name: hades_effect
description: First magic attack deals more damage

name: bell_effect
description: Reduce recovery delay for arts with the same element as the quartz

name: sr_bell_effect
description: Reduce recovery delay for all arts and increase damage for arts with the same element as the quartz

name: moon_lens_effect_1
description: Can see enemy stats in battle

name: moon_lens_effect_2
description: Can see chests on the minimap

name: assault_point_recovery_on_field
description: Assault points recover on the field

name: intimidation_effect
description: Enemies more likely to run away

name: effort_effect
description: Increased chance to make a superb dish

name: prankster_effect
description: Increased chance to make a peculiar dish
